attributes.action: Make football teams pay for %100 of policing costs on match days
attributes.additional_details: Save the taxpayers money that can be used elsewhere such as the NHS
attributes.background: Make football teams pay %100 of policing costs on match days it’s costing the tax payer millions each year when football clubs are already rich and spend 100s of millions on players so footing the extra 10mil a year it’s costing the tax pay for policing costs the football teams should pay it !

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is an operational decision for the police and clubs.
